title: Built for the Weekend
overview: From a double-decker party boat, to a floating playground, to a dock with a built-in swimming pool, brothers Kevin and Andrew are dreaming up and building everything needed for an epic weekend of fun! After years of designing one-of-a-kind projects at their own getaway retreat, they're turning it up a notch by hitting the road and taking their cool and creative ideas to families in need of vacation property upgrades.
